plugin.name: Littelplant-icon
plugin.onhover: showtext(نمايش به صورت سرزمين کوچک, ToolTips);set(crop,0|33|33|33);

krpano.action: //trace('*** nothing to do as there is no alignement in this case and x is not taken in account !!!');
copy(align_offset,plugin[%1].x); edge_correction(%1);
sub(align_offset, %2, plugin[%1].x); edge_correction(%1);
get_mouse_offset( time_bar , get(plugin[time_bar].plugin_video_is ));
set(seek_dragging, false);
